metadata.title: Lipton Herbal Supplement, Bedtime Bliss, 15 ct
features: Lipton Bedtime Bliss Herbal Supplement sings you to sleep*, like a lullaby in a cup *This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease
Lipton Bedtime Bliss Herbal Supplement has a light taste with hints of mint and chamomile, and aroma of orange peel
Naturally caffeine free, carefully selected botanicals are blended with chamomile essential oils to make every cup delicious.
Enjoy a nightly cup of Lipton Bedtime Bliss to supplement your varied, balanced diet
Makes 15 servings of Lipton Bedtime Bliss caffeine free herbal supplement per carton
description: Embrace your sweetest dreams and brightest mornings with the Lipton Bedtime Bliss Caffeine-Free Herbal Supplement, containing chamomile, mint, and orange peel. Bedtime Bliss is an herbal infusion that sings you to sleep, like a lullaby in a cup*. Carefully selected botanicals are blended with chamomile essential oils to make every cup delicious. Enjoy a nightly cup of Lipton Bedtime Bliss to supplement your varied, balanced diet. Wellbeing by Lipton. Feel Happy & Healthy. The New Lipton Wellness range - made with carefully selected botanicals and blended with essential oils, helps make wellbeing a part of your everyday routine – in just 4-6 minutes of brew time. Each item in the Lipton Wellness Range is crafted for those moments in life when you need some extra self-care. The new Lipton Wellness range comes in five varieties: - Stress Less: A comforting, cozy Herbal infusion to help you unwind* - Detox: This Herbal and Green infusion is the perfect companion to clean eating* - Soothe Your Tummy: An Herbal infusion for those times your tummy feels less than its best* - Bedtime Bliss: An Herbal infusion that sings you to sleep, like a lullaby in a cup* - Daily Support: An excellent source of Vitamin C, this Herbal infusion helps support your body’s natural defenses* *This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

title: Our Point of View on Lipton Soothe Your Tummy  Herbal Tea
